stork.module.ftp

Class FTPChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.module.ftp.FTPChannel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FTPChannel.Lock

    public class FTPChannel
extends Object
    An abstraction of an FTP control channel. This class takes care of command pipelining, extracting replies, and maintaining channel state. Right now, the channel is mostly concurrency-safe, though issues could arise if arbitrary commands entered the pipeline during a command sequence. A simplisitic channel locking mechanism exists which can be used for synchronized access to the channel, but it is still ill-advised to have more than one subsystem issuing commands through the same channel at the same time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FTPChannel.Command
      This is sort of the workhorse of the channel.
      class  FTPChannel.DataChannel
      Asynchronous FTP data channel abstraction.
      class  FTPChannel.Lock
      Instantiating this class requests a lock on the channel and returns a special view of the channel once the lock request is satisfied.
      class  FTPChannel.Reply
